snippet: The coalition, to be called GoBizNYC, will push for the formation of a small-business caucus in the City Council.
abstract: Coalition of small-business owners is organizing to try to influence legislation and city policy, concerned about fines, taxes and regulation in New York; coalition, to be called GoBizNYC, will seek to amplify the voice of small businesses in city’s political process.
lead_paragraph: The coalition, to be called GoBizNYC, will push for the formation of a small-business caucus in the City Council.

headline.main: Small Businesses, With Group, Seek Greater Say in New York City’s Policies
headline.print_headline: Small Shops Seek a Voice At City Hall
